info.title: IndiaCP API
info.description: This API will drive the UI

post.description: This creates a new CP Program with the details provided

parameters.name: cpprogramDetails
parameters.description: Details of the CP Program to be Issued

get.summary: Fetch All CPPrograms for the current Issuer. The current Issuer is assumed from the DL Node that this request is forwarded to.
get.description: Returns all the CP Programs for the current issuer

get.summary: Get CP Program details by Id. The current Issuer is assumed from the DL Node that this request is forwarded to.
get.description: This returns a single CP Program identified by an Id provided by the call

parameters.name: cpProgramId
parameters.description: CP Program ID that uniquely identifies the CP Program issued by the Issuer

post.summary: Uploads and attaches the provided document to the CPProgram on the DL
post.description: Uploads and attaches the provided document to the CPProgram on the DL

parameters.name: cpProgramId
parameters.description: CP Program ID that uniquely identifies the CP Program issued by the Issuer

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Document Attachment Details

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document Attachment

post.summary: Adds the ISIN to the India CP Program
post.description: Adds the ISIN to the India CP Program

parameters.name: cpProgramId
parameters.description: CP Program ID that uniquely identifies the CP Program issued by the Issuer

parameters.name: isin
parameters.description: ISIN generated by NSDL

get.summary: Complete audit log of all changes/versions of given CP Program
get.description: A given CP Program once initiated undergoes various changes as it progresses through the trade lifecycle of generating ISIN, generating Deal Confirmations with each identified Investor, getting IPA Verification till the final settlement of all Deals and followed by redemption of the CP at the Maturity Date. This API will return this complete log history.

parameters.name: cpProgramId
parameters.description: CP Program ID that uniquely identifies the CP Program issued by the Issuer

200.description: An array of all versions of the given CP Program

post.summary: Issue new CP under a CPProgram
post.description: This creates a new CP with the details provided

parameters.name: cpDetails
parameters.description: Details of the CP to be Issued

post.summary: Amend an issued CP by adding settlement details to it
post.description: This amends an issued CP with Settlement Details

parameters.name: cpIssueId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the CP Issue

parameters.name: settlementDetails
parameters.description: Settlement Details

200.description: Amended the CP Issue with the Settlement Details

post.summary: Uploads and attaches the provided document to the CP on the DL
post.description: Uploads and attaches the provided document to the CP on the DL

parameters.name: cpIssueId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the CP Issue

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Document Attachment Details

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document Attachment

post.summary: Cancels a CP providing the reason for the cancellation
post.description: Cancels a CP providing the reason for the cancellation

parameters.name: cpIssueId
parameters.description: CP Issue ID that uniquely identifies the CP to be cancelled

parameters.name: cancellationReason
parameters.description: Reason for cancellation

get.summary: Get CP Issues allotted under a given CP Program
get.description: This returns all the CP Issues under the umbrella CP Program identified by an Id provided by the call

parameters.name: cpProgramId
parameters.description: CP Program ID that uniquely identifies the CP Program issued by the Issuer

200.description: Returns all CP Issues under the umbrella CP Program

get.summary: Get All Open CP Issues for the given Issuer/Investor. Open CP Issues refers to the Issues that are yet to mature
get.description: This returns all the Open CP Issues for the given DL Node

200.description: Get All Open CP Issues for the given Issuer/Investor. Open CP Issues refers to the Issues that are yet to mature

get.summary: Get CP Issue for the given Issuer/Investor
get.description: This returns the CP Issue identified by an Id provided by the call

parameters.name: cpIssueId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the CP Issue to be fetched

200.description: Get CP Issue for the given Issuer/Investor

get.summary: Complete audit log of all changes/versions of given CP Issue
get.description: A given CP Issue once initiated undergoes various changes as it progresses through the trade lifecycle of adding settlement details, Deal Confirmations till the final settlement of all Deals and followed by redemption of the CP at the Maturity Date. This API will return this complete log history.

parameters.name: cpIssueId
parameters.description: CP Issue ID that uniquely identifies the CP issued by the Issuer

200.description: An array of all versions of the given CP Issues

post.summary: Uploads the Credit Rating Document and Creates a Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy
post.description: Uploads the Credit Rating Document and Creates a Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy

parameters.name: creditRatingDetails
parameters.description: Credit Rating Details for creating the Smart Contract

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document Attachment

post.summary: Uploads the Credit Rating Document and amends the Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy
post.description: Uploads the Credit Rating Document and amends the Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy

parameters.name: creditRatingDetails
parameters.description: Credit Rating Details for creating the Smart Contract

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document Attachment

get.summary: Get current active Credit Rating details
get.description: This returns only the current active credit rating details

200.description: Get current Active Credit Rating Details

get.summary: Cancel current active Credit Rating details
get.description: Cancel current active Credit Rating details

200.description: Cancel current Active Credit Rating Details

post.summary: Uploads the Board Resolution Document and Creates a Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy
post.description: Uploads the Board Resolution Document and Creates a Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy

parameters.name: boardResolutionDetails
parameters.description: Board Resolution Details for creating the Smart Contract

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document Attachment

post.summary: Uploads the Board Resolution Document and Amends a Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy
post.description: Uploads the Board Resolution Document and Amends a Smart Contract for the same on the DL to establish immutable golden copy

parameters.name: amendBoardResolution
parameters.description: Board Resolution Details for creating the Smart Contract

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document Attachment

get.summary: Get current active Board Resolution details
get.description: This returns only the current active board resolution details

200.description: Get current Active Board Resolution Details

get.summary: Cancel current active Board Resolution details
get.description: Cancel current active Board Resolution details

200.description: Cancel current Active Board Resolution Details

legalEntityId.description: Unique identifier of the Legal Entity that this document is Issued for

currentOutstandingCreditBorrowing.description: Outstanding Credit Borrowing. This is an auto computed value. It is computed by the Smart Contract based on the outstanding open CP Program Sizes.

currency.description: Currency. Defaulted to INR for India Commercial Paper

creditRatingEffectiveDate.description: Rating effective date, which can be different from the issuance date

docHash.description: SHA256 Hash of the Credit Rating Document

version.description: Current version of the CR Document. This is auto incremented by the DL.

modifiedBy.description: Unique identifier of the Logged-in User that performed the action. This is required for Audit History

lastModifiedDate.description: Last Modified Date for this CPIssue. This is required for Audit History

status.description: There can be only one active CR Document at any given time

legalEntityId.description: Unique identifier of the Legal Entity that this document is issued by

currentOutstandingCreditBorrowing.description: Outstanding Credit Borrowing. This is an auto computed value. It is computed by the Smart Contract based on the outstanding open CP Program Sizes.

currency.description: Currency. Defaulted to INR for India Commercial Paper

boardResolutionIssuanceDate.description: Date on which the BR was issued

boardResolutionExpiryDate.description: Date on which the BR will become obsolete

docHash.description: SHA256 Hash of the Credit Rating Document

version.description: Current version of the CR Document. This is auto incremented by the DL.

modifiedBy.description: Unique identifier of the Logged-in User that performed the action. This is required for Audit History

lastModifiedDate.description: Last Modified Date for this BR upload. This is required for Audit History

status.description: There can be only one active CR Document at any given time

programId.description: Unique identifier representing a specific CP Program raised by an Issuer

isin.description: Unique CP Security Identifier No. In India this is issued by NSDL for Commercial Paper type of securities.

issuerId.description: Unique identifier of the Issuer. This will also uniquely map to the DL Node of the Issuer

issueCommencementDate.description: Date when the CP Program was initiated. India regulations mandate that a program should be fully allocated within 2 weeks of commencement.

programSize.description: Total borrowing amount under this CP Program

programAllocatedValue.description: Amount already allocated to the CP program

programCurrency.description: Currency of the issue of CP notes

maturityDays.description: No of days to maturity from the value date

ipaId.description: Unique identifier of the IPA. This will also uniquely map to the DL Node of the IPA

depositoryId.description: Unique identifier of the Depository (NSDL). This will also uniquely map to the DL Node of the Depository

isinGenerationRequestDocId.description: Unique identifier of the documents sent to the depository to generate ISIN

ipaVerificationRequestDocId.description: Unique identifier of the documents sent to the IPA to certify the CP Program

ipaCertificateDocId.description: Unique identifier of the IPA certificate issued by the IPA on verification of the CP Program and supporting Issuer documents

corporateActionFormDocId.description: Unique identifier of the Corporate Action Form generated by the Issuer to allot CP

allotmentLetterDocId.description: Unique identifier of the Allotment Letter generated by IPA for CP transfer to Investor DP account

status.description: Current status of the CP Program

version.description: Current version of the CP Program

modifiedBy.description: Unique identifier of the Logged-in User that performed the action. This is required for Audit History

lastModifiedDate.description: Last Modified Date for this CPIssue. This is required for Audit History

cpProgramId.description: Unique identifier representing a specific CP Program raised by an Issuer. This CP Issue is allotted under this umbrella program

cpTradeId.description: Unique identifier representing a specific CP Issue under the umbrella CP Program

bookId.description: Internal Book Id that this trade is booked under

isin.description: Unique CP Security Identifier No. In India this is issued by NSDL for Commercial Paper type of securities.

traderId.description: Unique identifier of the trader booking this trade

beneficiaryId.description: Unique identifier of the Investor. This also uniquely identifies the Investor DL Node

tradeDate.description: Date on which the trade was captured

valueDate.description: Date on which the trade was settled and the Cash and CP securities were swapped between the Issuer and the Investor

maturityDays.description: Tenor of the CP maturity calculated from value date

currency.description: Currency of the issued CP Notes

facevaluePerUnit.description: Face Value per Unit * NoOfUnits is the amount that will be paid by the Issuer to the Investor on redemption

rate.description: Rate at which the yield is calculated

dealConfirmationDocId.description: Unique identifier of the deal confirmation document signed by both the Issuer and the Investor

status.description: Current status of the CP Issue

version.description: Current version of the CP Issue

modifiedBy.description: Unique identifier of the Logged-in User that performed the action. This is required for Audit History

lastModifiedDate.description: Last Modified Date for this CPIssue. This is required for Audit History

cpProgramId.description: Unique identifier of the CP Program that this document is associated with

cpIssueId.description: Unique identifier of the CP Issue that this document is associated with

docType.description: Type of Legal Documents exchanged and signed/countersigned by participants in the CPProgram

docHash.description: SHA256 Hash of the Content of the Document. This hash uniquely identifies the document.

docStatus.description: The current status of the document. Possible values are UNSIGNED, SIGNED_BY_ISSUER, SIGNED_BY_INVESTOR, SIGNED_BY_IPA, SIGNED_BY_NSDL

modifiedBy.description: Unique identifier of the Logged-in User that performed the action. This is required for Audit History

lastModifiedDate.description: Last Modified Date for this CPIssue. This is required for Audit History

creditorName.description: Name in which the payment has to be made. For e.g. Barclays Investments & Loans (India) Ltd CP

bankAccountNo.description: Bank account no. at the IPA Bank

bankAccountType.description: Bank account type. For e.g. current account

rtgsIfscCode.description: RTGS IFSC code of the IPA Bank to receive payments

dpId.description: Unique identifier of the DP Account at the Depository

dpName.description: Name under which the DP Account is registered. For e.g. Barclays Securities India Pvt Ltd

dpType.description: Depository Account Type. For now only the IPA has two depository accounts one for Allotment and one for Redemption

clientId.description: Unique identifier of the Client at the Depository

code.description: Unique Id to identify the type of error. For e.g. CP Program Creation, ISIN Generation, etc.

source.description: Source of the error identifying the layer where the error originated. For e.g. DL Integration Layer, DL (Corda/Ethereum), Reference Data Service

details.description: Details of the error. This could also be the complete stack trace. It would be useful for debugging
